participant_1.background:
My older sister plays clarinet.
I have a pomeranian.
I have entered into many violin competitions before and have placed in a few of them.
My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.

participant_2.background:
I played football in college.
I run two miles everyday.
I work at a candy store.
I have a passion for politics.

content.text: Nice to meet you, John! My name is Jessica.
Nice to meet you too, Jessica!
So, what do you do for fun?
I run two miles every day, and I work at a candy store.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love running, but I don't get to do it as often as I would like.
It's a great way to stay in shape! And I get to eat all the candy I want at work.
That's a good perk! I'm not really a big fan of candy, but I do love chocolate.
Me too! I love all kinds of candy, but chocolate is definitely my favorite.
So, what are you passionate about?
I'm passionate about politics! I think it's so important to be involved in our government and to make our voices heard.
I agree! I think it's important to be informed and to vote.
Me too! I'm always looking for new ways to get involved in politics.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm not sure how involved I want to be in politics, but I definitely want to be informed.
That's a good start! And you can always get more involved as you learn more about it.
I'm sure I will! I'm excited to learn more about politics.
